menu.name: Bruschetta
menu.description: Grilled bread topped with diced tomatoes, basil, garlic, and olive oil.

menu.name: Caesar Salad
menu.description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

menu.name: Margherita Pizza
menu.description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

menu.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
menu.description: Spaghetti in a creamy sauce with pancetta, eggs, and Parmesan cheese.

menu.name: Tiramisu
menu.description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.
